text: Fill in the missing words to create an in-text reference.
notFilledOut: Please fill in all blanks to view solution
a11yCheck: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.
a11yShowSolution: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.
a11yRetry: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

confirmCheck.body: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

confirmRetry.body: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

questions:
Create an in-text reference for evidence which comes from page 52 of Stella Cottrell's book Critical Thinking Skills, which was published in 2011.

(*Cottrell*, *2011*, *p.52*).

Create an in-text reference for evidence coming from a journal article written by Tariq Modood. Here is the reference from the reference list:

Modood, T. (2021) “National Identity and Ethnoreligious Identity,” Identities, 28(4), pp. 506–512.

The evidence used comes from page 510.

(*Modood*, *2021*, *p.510*).

Create an in-text reference for evidence from this website: https://www.mind.org.uk/information-support/tips-for-everyday-living/student-life/support-and-treatment/. The page is called 'how to cope with student life' and the author is the organisation Mind. The page was last updated in 2022.

(*Mind*, *2022*)
